title: Online Learning Engagement Enhancement Program for Multicultural Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills, no online learning experience
context.additional_context: A course for multicultural learners to improve language skills using mobile devices in limited technological environments. Core focus is enhancing interaction considering cultural differences among learners

learning_goals: Learners can consistently engage with weekly microlearning content at an 80%+ completion rate in mobile environments.
Learners can apply three or more intercultural communication strategies to understand cultural differences and facilitate smooth online communication with peer learners.
Learners can achieve 70%+ of weekly language learning objectives using smartphone-based learning tools (quizzes, forums, recording features, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
